options.name: Safe Fall
options.description: You take half Damage from falling that is applied after the Acrobatics Check to Mitigate the Damage. Additionally, you take no Damage when falling 6 Units or less.

options.name: Aerialist
options.description: Your Acrobatics Modifier replaces your Athletics for determining the distance you can Jump and checks that involve Climbing.

options.name: Reaction : Rolling Dodge
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge until the start of your next turn. Each time you Dodge an Attack successfully, gain another +1 Dodge until the start of your next turn

options.name: Action : Parkour Strike
options.description: Make an Attack with a +2 Modifier. If your Attack hits, you can bounce off your Target 1 unit plus a distance equal to your Melee Range and avoid provoking Reactions.

options.name: Quick Dodge
options.description: You can use your Dodge Modifier to Defend against Ray Attacks

options.name: Master Acrobat
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge, +1 Movement Speed and +1 Acrobatics
